scripts.test: npm run test-unit && npm run test-sample
scripts.test-sample: DEBUG=screenstory:* ./bin/screenstory.js --timeout 0 samples/github.js --global assert --extension samples/extensions/foo.js --extension samples/extensions/function.js --project-name screenstory --resolution 1024x768 --screenshot-diff --screenshot-width 320 --screenshot-width 800 --screenshot-width 1024  --screenshot-width 1600
